user_question: What are the current trends in sustainable investing, and can you generate an infographic on the top sustainable investment sectors?
final_answer: Current trends in sustainable investing include increased focus on ESG factors, green bonds, and renewable energy investments. Infographic on top sustainable investment sectors generated. Examples of companies leading in these sectors include Tesla, Ørsted, and NextEra Energy.
